dict.acceptation: 排队；用线标出；[棒球]（击球手）击出（平直球）；给…安衬里；
（在某物的内部）形成一层；排队，排列成行，排齐（常与 up 连用）；[棒球]（击球手）击出平直球；（击球手因击出的平直球被对方接住而）出局；

sent.orig: In-line filters are used to remove particulate matter.
sent.trans: 使用线内(in-line)过滤器来清除颗粒物。

sent.orig: Line-To-Line Voltage Line-to-line voltage is the voltage between any two phases an AC generator.
sent.trans: 线电压线电压是指交流发电机任何两相间的电压。

sent.orig: A line of roller, belt line, with net line, hoisting chain line, shelves and other products.
sent.trans: 有辊筒线、皮带线、网带线、悬挂链线、货架等系列产品。

sent.orig: The line array appears as FIG. 2D when viewed downwards along line parallel to line 36.
sent.trans: 当沿着一条平行于直线36的线向下观察时，线性阵列如图2D所示。

sent.orig: Huibo has fasteners international advanced automatic line, mesh-belt heat treatment line, hot dip galvanized steel line.
sent.trans: 汇博拥有国际先进的紧固件自动化生产线、网带热处理生产线、热浸镀锌生产线。
